channel.title: catherine-rutherford on Cottenie Lab
channel.description: Recent content in catherine-rutherford on Cottenie Lab

item.description: I am a fourth year student majoring in Wildlife Biology and Conservation, with plans to pursue graduate studies in ecology and conservation biology. I am currently working with Simon Denomme-Brown on a meta-analysis of small mammal density-dependent dispersal and will look more deeply at the factors affecting small mammal dispersal.
